abstract: AT&T and its Mexican affiliate, América Móvil, have bid more than $6 billion for control of Italy’s largest cellphone company, Telecom Italia.
snippet: AT&T and its Mexican affiliate, América Móvil, have bid more than $6 billion for control of Italy’s largest cellphone company, Telecom Italia.
lead_paragraph: MILAN, April 2 — AT&T and its Mexican affiliate, América Móvil, have bid more than $6 billion for control of Italy’s largest cellphone company, Telecom Italia.

headline.main: AT&T and Mexican Affiliate Seek Stake in Italian Company
headline.print_headline: AT&T and Mexican Affiliate Seek Stake in Italian Company
